org.sakaiproject.basiclti

Class UrlUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.basiclti.UrlUtility

  • public class UrlUtility
extends Object
    Utility class implementing the Base64 modified Base64 for URL variant. See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ Base64.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String cleanUrl(String encodedUrl)
      Clean an encoded string so it may be embedded as a query parameter.
      static String decodeUrl(String encodedUrl)
      Decode a URL encoded by this class, typically from a query parameter.
      static String encodeUrl(String url)
      Encode a URL to be embedded as a query parameter.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      static String rawDecodeUrl(String encodedUrl)
      Utility method to do non-URL safe decoding.
      static String rawEncodeUrl(String url)
      Utility method to do non-URL safe encoding.
      static String repairUrl(String cleanedUrl)
      Repair a URL cleaned by this class, so the raw encode/decode methods will operate.

    • Method Detail

      • encodeUrl

        public static String encodeUrl(String url)
        Encode a URL to be embedded as a query parameter.
        Parameters:
        url - Plaintext URL to encode
        Returns:
        Properly encoded String, ready to be embedded as a query parmeter

      • decodeUrl

        public static String decodeUrl(String encodedUrl)
        Decode a URL encoded by this class, typically from a query parameter.
        Parameters:
        encodedUrl - Encoded URL as processed by this class
        Returns:
        Decoded String, in its original form

      • rawEncodeUrl

        public static String rawEncodeUrl(String url)
        Utility method to do non-URL safe encoding. This method provides the base encoding, while cleanUrl scrubs it for URL safety. You will not generally be concerned with this method.
        Parameters:
        url - Plaintext URL to encode
        Returns:
        Encoded String, not guaranteed to be URL-safe

      • rawDecodeUrl

        public static String rawDecodeUrl(String encodedUrl)
        Utility method to do non-URL safe decoding. As with rawEncodeUrl, you will generally not be concerned with this method.
        Parameters:
        encodedUrl - Raw encoded URL to decode
        Returns:
        Decoded String URL

      • cleanUrl

        public static String cleanUrl(String encodedUrl)
        Clean an encoded string so it may be embedded as a query parameter.
        Parameters:
        encodedUrl - Encoded String to clean
        Returns:
        Processed URL that is safe to embed as a query parameter. It will not contain any characters that will interfere with other parameters.

      • repairUrl

        public static String repairUrl(String cleanedUrl)
        Repair a URL cleaned by this class, so the raw encode/decode methods will operate.
        Parameters:
        cleanedUrl - Cleaned, encoded URL to repair
        Returns:
        Encoded URL, ready for native encoding and decoding.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
